short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GetOuttaMyFace - Control the Clarification and Info Panels on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "GOMF: Get Out of My Face" - a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube experience! Tired of cluttered information panels and distracting clarifications? GOMF allows you to effortlessly blur or hide those pesky elements, providing a clean and focused YouTube interface. Upgrade to the full version for an ad-free, distraction-free browsing experience across the web. Install GOMF now and take control of your YouTube journey!
